full_text: The U.S. Soccer Federation and dozens of members of the women’s national team who sued it for gender discrimination reached a $24 million settlement agreement https://t.co/dKd8VwWpHj

localize.full_text: 米国サッカー連盟と、男女差別で訴えた女子代表チームのメンバー数十人が、2400万ドルの和解合意に至った https://t.co/dKd8VwWpHj
